item.title: CRLite: Fast, private, and comprehensive certificate revocation checking in Firefox
item.description: ð Firefox has launched CRLite, the first fast and private certificate revocation checking system that protects user browsing activity. This new mechanism downloads a compact list of revoked certificates, making checking efficient and reliable. Starting with Firefox 137, CRLite enhances security while disabling the less private OCSP method in future updates. #Firefox #CRLite #Cybersecurity #Privacy #WebDevelopment
